nodes.text: RA-7-D was a RA-7 protocol droid which acted as an engineer and saboteur for the Rebel Alliance. He believed that he was in love with a medical droid, although it was unknown if this is due to a programming glitch or a form of emergent behavior. RA-7-D also believed that the best way to demonstrate this love was to blow up Imperial targets, preferably in a showy fashion.
RA-7-D is one of the pre-generated characters from the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beta
